queries.Top-Earners:
SELECT
    first_name,
    last_name,
    organization,
    subtitle,
    ytd_gross_earnings
FROM
    "2017 Maryland state salaries"
ORDER BY
    ytd_gross_earnings DESC
LIMIT
    50;
queries.Highest-paid-in-organization:
SELECT
    organization,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    max(ytd_gross_earnings) AS ytd_gross_earnings
FROM
    "2017 Maryland state salaries"
GROUP BY
    organization
ORDER BY
    ytd_gross_earnings DESC;
queries.Total-earnings-by-organization:
SELECT
    organization,
    sum(ytd_gross_earnings)
        AS "Total Organization Earnings(dollars)"
FROM
    "2017 Maryland state salaries"
GROUP BY
    organization
ORDER BY
    sum(ytd_gross_earnings) DESC;
queries.Average-salary-per-organization:
SELECT
    organization,
    avg(annual_salary) AS "Average Annual Salary(dollars)"
FROM
    "2017 Maryland state salaries"
GROUP BY
    organization
ORDER BY
    avg(annual_salary) DESC;
queries.Overtime-per-organization:
SELECT
    organization,
    avg(overtime_earnings) AS "Average Overtime(dollars)",
    max(overtime_earnings) AS "Max Overtime(dollars)",
    count(*) AS "Total Employees(numeric)"
FROM
    "2017 Maryland state salaries"
GROUP BY
    organization
ORDER BY
    avg(overtime_earnings) DESC;
queries.Number-of-employees-in-organization:
SELECT
    organization, pay_rate, count(*) AS "Employees(numeric)"
FROM
    "2017 Maryland state salaries"
GROUP BY
    organization, pay_rate
ORDER BY
    pay_rate ASC, count(*) DESC;

organizations: Canal Place Preservation and Development Authority
Department of Labor, Licensing and Regulation
Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services
Maryland Institute for Emergency Medical Services Systems
Maryland Teachers and State Employees Supplemental Retirement Plans
